All rights reserved. @@ -451,1 +451,6 @@ -: Terminates compilation when warnings occur. +: Terminates compilation when any warnings occur; this includes warnings in all lint + categories, as well as non-lint warnings. + +`-Werror:`\[`-`\]*key*(`,`\[`-`\]*key*)\* +: Enables and/or disables specific categories of lint warnings that should terminate compilation. + See [`-Xlint`](#option-Xlint-custom) below for the list of lint category keys.
